doc:
Mark Lindsay Chapman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Lindsay_Chapman 0 Mark Lindsay Chapman (born 8 September 1954) is an English actor. He is known for his roles as Chief Officer Henry Wilde in the film Titanic (1997) and as John Lennon in the film Chapter 27 (2007). Mark_Lindsay_Chapman ( born 8_September_1954 ) is an_English_actor . He is_known for his_roles as Chief_Officer_Henry_Wilde in the_film Titanic_(_1997_) and as John_Lennon in the_film_Chapter 27_(_2007_) .
